messages.message: Invalid byteOffset in Level Index. byteOffset must match the expected value.
messages.details: Level 2 byteOffset is 458 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 257.

messages.message: Invalid sgdByteLength for BasisLZ/ETC1S. sgdByteLength must be at least 20 bytes (sizeof ktxBasisLzGlobalHeader).
messages.details: sgdByteLength is 1 but for BasisLZ/ETC1S textures it must be at least 20 bytes (sizeof ktxBasisLzGlobalHeader).

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
